meta.description: Optimize the number of customers attracted by games in an amusement park under budget and game type constraints.

sets.name: GAMES
sets.description: Types of games available in the amusement park

params.name: customers_per_hour
params.description: Number of customers attracted per hour by each type of game

params.name: cost_per_hour
params.description: Cost in prizes per hour for each type of game

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of game

objective.name: max_total_customers
objective.description: Maximize the total number of customers attracted every hour

constraints.name: prize_budget
constraints.description: Total cost in prizes must not exceed $100 per hour

constraints.name: throwing_vs_climbing
constraints.description: There must be at least twice as many throwing games as climbing games

constraints.name: min_climbing_games
constraints.description: There must be at least 5 climbing games
